thread.title: Georgia T

author: Georgia T
title: Georgia T
text: From the moment I ordered my tyre and mobile fitting appointment I received an email confirmation. The next morning I received an email to say I had a 2hr time slot between 9:30 and 11:30. At 9:30 I got a call from Jonny to say he was 30 minutes away. He arrived just before 10am and he fitted my new tyre by 10:15. I am so impressed! I received great customer service. I Will defintely be using tyresonyourdrive.com in the future and I will be recommending them to everyone I know. Thank you Jonny for a job well done.
